name: shropshire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in central western England, on the border with Wales: The iron bridge spans the Severn River near Coalbrookdale, in Shropshire.
More examplesFewer examplesThe village of Albrighton, in Shropshire, was temporarily cut off when rain forced the closure of several roads.David Gojka, 17, from Shropshire, emerged as champion.They were making a delicious snack - fresh Shropshire strawberries dipped in melted chocolate.She was asked to prepare an independent report for Shropshire County Council.
